item.title: New Keyboard
item.description: I decided to treat myself to a new mechanical keyboard. I spend a lot of time on my computer working from home and over the last several years I’ve been slowly upgrading my home setup. While my previous Corsair k55 has held up well, I have been eyeing a the daskeyboard line for several years now and was looking for something a little more satisfying to use in my current setup.

item.title: 100 Days to Offload
item.description: 100 Days to Offload and Starting Over Starting Over Seems like every few years I get the itch to actually do something with this website that I’ve owned for many years. I’m not a great writer and don’t consider myself very interesting. I definitely have not been very consistent when it comes to writing a blog. So why am I doing this now? Well it came about with my renewed interest in using Mastodon shortly after the twitter takeover.
